nodes.text: Jozdit was a former pirate that lived on the planet Rishi during the Third Galactic War. They served as a member on the Tribunal in the year 3626 BBY.

The player never actually meets Jozdit in the game, rather, they only ever hear about them should the player choose to threaten Navolii during the quest "Sharing Our Bounty" on Rishi during the Feast of Prosperity event storyline.

Should the player do this, they will get a threatening letter from Jozdit who informs them that they know about the threats made against Navolii, and that they will be keeping their eye on the Feast to make sure it is not up to anything malevolent.
